name: MIS PIU Visitors Restrictions
description:
Is for police intelligence purposes. This is an establishment based report returning all visitors who have an open visits restriction and details of the prisoner to whom they are associated.
POL0009 â€“ v00.00.02 Last Modified: 07/12/16

dataset.name: Visitor Restrictions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.LAST_NAME, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.RESTRICTION_DESC, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME AS OFFENDER_GIVEN_NAME_1, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR, BODIMIS.DIM_VISITOR_LOCAL_RESTRICTION AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_OTHER_CONTACTS AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSON_ID_NK = AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSON_ID (+)) AND (AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.PERSON_ID = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID > 0 AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.LOCAL_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG = (1))) UNION SELECT AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.LAST_NAME, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.RESTRICTION_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME AS OFFENDER_GIVEN_NAME_1, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR, BODIMIS.DIM_VISITOR_GLOBAL_RESTRICTION AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_OTHER_CONTACTS AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK = AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK (+)) AND (AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.PERSON_ID = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID > 0 AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.VISITOR_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG = (1)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT VISITOR_PERSON_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, RESTRICTION_DESC, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, OFFENDER_GIVEN_NAME_1, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Contacts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.PERSON_ID, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.FIRST_NAME, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.LAST_NAME, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.BIRTH_DATE, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.FLAT || ' ' || DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.PREMISE AS OTHER_CONTACT_HOUSE_INFORMAT31, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.STREET, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.locality || (CASE WHEN DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.locality IS NULL THEN DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.locality IS NULL AND DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.locality IS NULL AND DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.locality IS NULL THEN ', ' || DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city ELSE ', ' || DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city END) || (CASE WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.county IS NULL AND NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city IS NULL THEN ', ' || DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.county WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.county IS NULL AND DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city IS NULL AND NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.locality IS NULL THEN ', ' || DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.county WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.county IS NULL AND NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city IS NULL THEN ', ' || DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.county WHEN NOT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.county IS NULL AND DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.city IS NULL AND DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.locality IS NULL THEN DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.county ELSE NULL END) AS OTHER_CONTACT_AREA, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.POST_CODE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dooc.offender_booking_sk, dooc.relationship ORDER BY dooc.active_flag DESC, dooc.address_flag DESC, dooc.mis_load_id DESC) AS row_seq_filter, dooc.*, CASE WHEN dooc.next_of_kin_flag = 'Y' THEN 'NEXTOFKIN' ELSE 'CONTACT' END AS Con_Addr_Type, CASE WHEN dooc.next_of_kin_flag = 'Y' THEN 'Next of Kin' ELSE 'Contact' END AS ConAddrTypeDesc FROM bodimis.dim_offender_other_contacts dooc) DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_FLAG (+) = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.ROW_SEQ_FILTER (+) = 1) AND (DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.ACTIVE_FLAG (+) = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, PERSON_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, OTHER_CONTACT_HOUSE_INFORMAT31, STREET, OTHER_CONTACT_AREA, POST_CODE, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: Report Variant 138632.RS does not have corresponding dataset undefined
